Plugin.Description: calculates the Bemis-Murcko framework of the molecule
Plugin.ReturnValue: the Bemis-Murcko framework of the molecule
Plugin.MoleculeContextExample: bemisMurcko() returns the Bemis-Murcko framework of the input molecule
Plugin.ReactionContextExample: bemisMurcko(reactant(0)) returns the Bemis-Murcko framework of the first reactant bemisMurcko(product(1)) returns the Bemis-Murcko framework of the second product

Plugin.Description: calculates the number of atoms in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the molecule
Plugin.ReturnValue: the number of atoms in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the molecule
Plugin.MoleculeContextExample: bemisMurckoAtomCount() returns the number of atoms in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the input molecule
Plugin.ReactionContextExample: bemisMurckoAtomCount(reactant(0)) returns the number of atoms in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the first reactant bemisMurckoAtomCount(product(1)) returns the number of atoms in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the second product

Plugin.Description: calculates the number of bonds in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the molecule

Plugin.ReactionContextExample: bemisMurckoBondCount(reactant(0)) returns the number of bonds in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the first reactant bemisMurckoBondCount(product(1)) returns the number of bonds in the Bemis-Murcko framework of the second product
